wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry Meredyth Chichele Plowden (26 September 1840 – 8 January 1920) was an English first-class cricketer. Plowden was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm roundarm off break. He was educated at Harrow and Trinity College, Cambridge.

response: The first Chief Justice at Lahore was Sir Henry Meredyth Plowden in 1880.  The current Chief Justice is Muhammad Qasim Khan, incumbent since 19 March 2020 and will be retired on 5th July 2021.
*Col Cecil Beadon (1838–1913) who married Elinor Augusta Flora Plowden (1846–1886), a sister of Sir Henry Meredyth Plowden
*Helen Beadon (1861–1933) married Sir Henry Meredyth Plowden (1840–1920)

link_mentions.page: Chief Justice of Lahore High Court
